TunableList.name: alternative_spawn_behaviors
TunableList.description: A list of (whitelist, spawn_action_list) pairs. The whitelist defines which situation jobs are allowed to run spawn actions from the spawn action list.

TunableTuple.name: affordance
TunableTuple.description: The Sim will run an interaction that will make it visible.

Tunable.name: spawn_affordance
Tunable.description: The affordance that is pushed on the Sim as soon as they are spawned on the lot.

Tunable.name: fallback_vehicle_def
Tunable.description: The definition of the vehicle to spawn if the sim doesn't have a favorite vehicle.

TunableEnum.name: vehicle_obj_tag
TunableEnum.description: The tag to use to look up if the sim has a favorite vehicle to use for the spawn action.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The chance that this spawn action will be chosen relative to other alternative spawn actions that are available for a given situation job.

TunableList.name: whitelist
TunableList.description: The situation jobs which are allowed to run spawn actions from the spawn action list.

Tunable.name: chance_of_using_instance_spawn_action
Tunable.display: Chance Of Using Instance Spawn Action
Tunable.description: The percent chance to use the instance defined spawn_action as opposed to an alternative spawn action defined here.

TunableEnum.name: BLACKLIST_FROM_ALL_JOBS_TAG
TunableEnum.description: The tag that is used to blacklist sims from all job types.

Tunable.name: CHANGE_OUTFIT_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: A reference that should be tuned to an interaction that will just set sim to their default outfit.
